duties_responsibilities.duty: Welcome all customers with genuine and friendly enthusiasm, communicating clearly and answering customer questions.
Assist stylists in closing sales by consulting with customers regarding gown fit and customization.
Lead and oversee all alterations fittings, sewing, steaming, pressing, and spot cleaning of garments to company standards.
Train Alterations Specialists in fitting and sewing techniques.
Maintain quality control guidelines and inspect all garments altered/steamed/pressed to verify pristine condition before final delivery to customer.
Use all approved systems and processes to manage the customer’s flow to deliver a 5 Star Customer Experience.
Maintain high dress code standards per company guidelines.
Manage the floor during peak sales times to offer fit and alterations consultations.

education_certification.credential: 1-2 years prior retail experience in an apparel or specialty store environment.
Prior sewing experience required, preferably in bridal and/or special occasion production environment.
Prior experience with computerized POS system and ability to use one.
